'''Stone Street Studios''' (located in [[Wellington]], New Zealand) is the main film production studio used by [[Peter Jackson]] to film [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].
